original_text: The thin cows ate the seven fat cows that came out of the river first.
korean_text: 그 파리하고 흉한 소가 처음의 일곱 살진 소를 먹었으며

sentences.original_text: The thin cows ate the seven fat cows
sentences.korean_translation: 마른 암소들은 일곱 살진 암소들을 먹었다

sentences.original_text: that came out of the river first
